### Learning Objectives

* Basic Graph Theory
* Calculate and interpret basic graph statistics
* Construct Graphs from Data
* Visualize graphs
* Social Network Analysis 
* Graph Databases

* [tidygraph tutorial](https://schochastics.github.io/tidynetAnaR/)
